product_name: Saris Porter 4-Bike Hitch Rack with Cable Lock and Key
long_description: With the extra security of a cable lock and key, the Saris Bike Porter 4-Bike Locking Hitch Rack loads up 4 bikes of varying sizes to get your family or group of friends out on the road.
short_description: With the extra security of a cable lock and key, the Saris Bike Porter 4-Bike Locking Hitch Rack loads up 4 bikes of varying sizes to get your family or group of friends out on the road.
